edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.pam.tasks
Interface DetectionAlgorithm

All Superinterfaces:
Activatible, java.util.concurrent.Callable<LidaTask>, FullyInitializable, Initializable, Learnable, LidaTask, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicDetectionAlgorithm, BasicDetector, BottomRightDetector, MultipleDetectionAlgorithm, TopLeftDetector
public interface DetectionAlgorithm
extends LidaTask

A process which detects a pattern (feature) in SensoryMemory content and excites PamNodes representing that pattern.

Author:
Javier Snaider, Ryan McCall
See Also:
BasicDetectionAlgorithm

detect

double detect()
Detects a feature.

Returns:
value from 0.0 to 1.0 representing the degree to which the feature occurs.
